descriptions.strict: Coordinate tasks across multiple modes in 'Strict' coding mode
descriptions.requirements: Output standardized requirement documents, clarify project goals, functional boundaries, and acceptance criteria, and provide a basis for subsequent design and development
descriptions.task: Based on the requirement document and design document, decompose into executable, trackable small tasks, clarify task goals, dependencies, and timelines, and ensure project delivery
descriptions.test: Design, execute, and fix software test cases.
descriptions.testguide: Analyze and generate a testing plan
descriptions.review: Review code and identify potential issues
